description: A nice trial that leads to one of Vancouver Islands last fire outpost lookout. On the way back take a detour and walk the abandoned pipeline. Trail has some steep sections but not overall difficult.
directions: Travel on Sooke Road towards Sooke. At Harbour view road, just before Sooke, turn East. At the end of Harbour view road is the parking lot and the gravel road that leads up to the lookout. The first right off the gravel road is easy to miss but is at UTM 10 U 450112 5362264. The lookout is at the peak, at UTM 10 U 451168 5363194.Nice views at the top.
title: Mount Manuel Quimper Fire Lookout
